entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
